n = int(input())
s = input()

# check if string is good
good = True
for i in range(0, len(s), 2):
    if s[i] == s[i + 1]:
        good = False

# if good, print string
if good:
    print(0)
    print(s)
else:
    # if not good, print all characters in even positions
    # (since odd positions will be different from the next character)
    print(len(s) - len(s) // 2)
    print(s[0::2])
